resources.string:
This is a programming quiz.
The languages included are-
1.) Java
2.)C++
3.)Android
Each question is time bound.
Scoring scheme-
For single word/single line answers - 3 marks for correct answer.
MCQ 1- Only one correct Answer - 5 marks for correct answer
MCQ 2 - Multiple correct answers- 7 marks for correct answwer
You can get to know about your score by pressing on submit button at the end.
Best Of Luck and Cheers!!!
